channel.title: Extremely easy question....i suck at technical stuff =P
channel.description:
ok ive downloaded moparscape as a source. ive made my no-ip server. checked off the box its in. downloaded the java thing, and did the port forewarding thing on this website, the only problem is...even tho i checked off zamorakscape.no-ip.org off in my no-ip DUC thing...i cant log on to my own server! :confused: :mad: :mad: :( :( :eek: :eek: plz i need to learn how, and go ahead and call me a noob or not good at technical stuff, cause i alreadey know i am. please help though peeps will appreciate help alot! :) ;D
Whoever helps and if ur suggestion works gets to be co-admin or owner etc....lol :) ;) ;D[br][size=1]Posted at: September 13, 2006, 06:06:53 PM[/size][hr]plz ppl come on i reeeeeely need help...

item.title: Extremely easy question....i suck at technical stuff =P
item.dc:creator: @pk3r0fz4mmy pk3r0fz4mmy
item.description:
@pk3r0fz4mmy wrote:

ty dude,hope it works.[br][size=1]Posted at: September 14, 2006, 05:29:22 PM[/size][hr]do i replace yourservername with zamorakscape.no-ip.org
?[br][size=1]Posted at: September 14, 2006, 05:44:35 PM[/size][hr]i replaced it with zamorakscape.no-ip.org and it still didnt work =([br][size=1]Posted at: September 14, 2006, 05:50:05 PM[/size][hr]and i opened this java thing once, and it had an option for snow at the top right corner once, how do i get to that again?plz help my server still not working

Read full topic
item.source: Extremely easy question....i suck at technical stuff =P

item.title: Extremely easy question....i suck at technical stuff =P
item.dc:creator: @usernamelol .Fusion
item.description:
@usernamelol wrote:

I would recomend testscape http://rapidshare.de/files/24522895/TestScape_Source.rar.html then leave the ip adress area blank but open up runserver file in your testscape source file after downloaded to get on your server.
NOTE: You will have to right click on the compile file in testscape folder , click on edit and replace whats in there with this @echo off COLOR 08 title YOURSERVERNAME Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_07\bin/java.exe" server pauseHope I helped .

Read full topic

[br][size=1]Posted at: September 13, 2006, 06:41:29 PM[/size][hr]dunno y its still not workin…[br][size=1]Posted at: September 13, 2006, 06:43:44 PM[/size][hr]ok these are the steps i have done, in order, if it makes a difference
1)made my no-ip server
2)downloaded no-ip program thingamajigger…
3)checked off zamorakscape.no-ip.org in the no-ip program…
4) downloaded the java everyone says to download…
5)did the firewall thingy…
6)did the port forewarding on this one website…
7)downloaded moparscape as a source…
8)im over here begging for help…

ive heard people talk about run&compile or something about downloading whitscape as a blank server…dunno
